title: Famous Writer Joanna Trollope Passes Away
summary: Joanna Trollope, a very famous author from England, has died at 82 years old. Her family shared the sad news. She wrote many popular books that people loved to read. Her stories often talked about love and family life in England. She was called the 'queen of the Aga saga,' but she did not like that name. Her daughters said she died peacefully at her home. Joanna wrote over 20 books, and some were made into TV shows. She also helped with charity work and got awards for her writing. She was related to another famous writer named Anthony Trollope, but not directly. Many people will miss her, including her family, friends, and readers all over the world.
